title: Touchscreen unresponsive since update
content:
Hello
On Saturday, my phone was being unresponsive so I turned it off and ten it started to do a software update randomly. Once it finally finished, I noticed  that my touch screen is very slow in response and some parts of the screen just don't respond.

Anything jus under the curve (the part under the front camera) doesn't respond so for example, if if I try to change my screen brightness it's not working and it's currently stuck. Anything I touch in that area is not working. 

Also my keyboard. When typing it responds slowly and enters in letters I didn't press making it difficult to type anything.

Sometimes if my screen is open and I'm not touching anything, my screen will randomly scroll or go on an app, etc as if I had touched something.

Please help. I've had a lot of problems with this phone since I got it in February.
